pr_title: [#10343] Fix unnecessary bottom line for last response

timeline.message: Fix unnecessary bottom line for last response

timeline.bodyText:
This can be simply to

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            <div class="row" [ngClass]="isLastResponse ? '' : 'border-bottom'"
          
          
            
            <div class="row" [class.border-bottom]="!isLastResponse"
          
      
    
    
  

if I am not wrong
timeline.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText: Yeap, can confirm that this gives the same intended output
replies.author: madanalogy

timeline.bodyText: We should not call it as last response as clearly this is grouped responses. Maybe lastGroupResponses
timeline.author: xpdavid

timeline.bodyText: Is there a typo? I don't see this class being used?
timeline.author: ccyccyccy

replies.bodyText:
It's being used at the top of the html file

  
    
      teammates/src/web/app/components/question-responses/grouped-responses/grouped-responses.component.html
    
    
         Line 1
      in
      eaceb11
    
    
    
    

        
          
           <div class="row" [class.border-bottom]="!isLastGroupedResponses"
replies.author: madanalogy

replies.bodyText: But that is border-bottom though, not bottom-border?
replies.author: ccyccyccy

replies.bodyText: ah yes typo sorry, thanks for catching that
replies.author: madanalogy
